GP12visnup_u:9383: tasmātkeśavanāmnā tvaṃ loke khyāto bhaviṣyasi // ViP_5,16.23 //
GP12visnup_u:9391: tvayaiva viditaṃ sarvaṃ svasti te 'stu vrajāmyaham // ViP_5,16.27 //
GP12visnup_u:9392: nārade tu gate kṛṣṇaḥ saha gopaiḥ sabhājitaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9399: yo 'ham aṃśāvatīrṇasya mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,17.2 //
GP12visnup_u:9405: drakṣyāmi tatparaṃ dhāma dhāmrāṃ bhagavato mukham // ViP_5,17.5 //
GP12visnup_u:9411: yasya svarūpaṃ jānanti pratyakṣaṃ yāti me hariḥ // ViP_5,17.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9413: yohya'cintyo 'vyayo vyāpī sa vakṣyati mayā saha // ViP_5,17.9 //
GP12visnup_u:9415: cakāra jagato yo 'jaḥ jagato yo 'jaḥ so 'dya māṃ pralapiṣyati // ViP_5,17.10 //
GP12visnup_u:9419: so 'vatīrṇo jagatyarthe māma krūreti vakṣyati // ViP_5,17.12 //
GP12visnup_u:9425: vedāntavedibhir viṣṇuḥ procyate yo natosmi tam // ViP_5,17.15 //
GP12visnup_u:9427: sadasattena satyena mayyasau yātu saumyātām // ViP_5,17.16 //
GP12visnup_u:9429: puruṣastamajaṃ nityaṃ vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ harim // ViP_5,17.17 //
GP12visnup_u:9432: akrūro gokulaṃ prāptaḥ kiñcitsūrye virājati // ViP_5,17.18 //
GP12visnup_u:9442: tasyānu balabhadraṃ ca dadarśa yadunandanam // ViP_5,17.23 //
GP12visnup_u:9451: apyeṣa pṛṣṭhe mama hastapadmaṃ kariṣyati śrīmadanantamūrtiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:9454: cakraṃ ghnatā daityapaterhṛtāni daityāṅganānāṃ nayanāñjanāni // ViP_5,17.29 //
GP12visnup_u:9460: kiṃ vā jagatyatra samastapuṃsāmajñātamasyāsti hṛdi sthitasya // ViP_5,17.32 //
GP12visnup_u:9466: akrurosmīti caraṇau nanāma śirasā hareḥ // ViP_5,18.1 //
GP12visnup_u:9468: saṃspṛśyākṛṣya ca prītya sugāḍhaṃ pariṣasvaje // ViP_5,18.2 //
GP12visnup_u:9474: yathā ca devakī devī dānavena durātmanā // ViP_5,18.5 //
GP12visnup_u:9475: ugrasene yathā kaṃsaḥsa durātmā ca vartate /
GP12visnup_u:9476: yaṃ caivārthaṃ samuddiśya kaṃsena tu visarjitaḥ // ViP_5,18.6 //
GP12visnup_u:9480: vicintyaṃ nānyathaitatte viddhi kaṃsaṃ hataṃ mayā // ViP_5,18.8 //
GP12visnup_u:9481: ahaṃ rāmaś ca mathurāṃ śvo yāsyāvaḥsaha tvayā /
GP12visnup_u:9482: gopavṛddhāś ca yāsyanti hyādāyopāyanaṃ bahu // ViP_5,18.9 //
GP12visnup_u:9483: niśeyaṃ nīyatāṃ vīra na cintāṃ kartumarhasi /
GP12visnup_u:9487: suṣvāpa balabhadraś ca nandagopagṛhe tataḥ // ViP_5,18.11 //
GP12visnup_u:9489: akrūreṇa samaṃ gantumudyatau mathurāṃ purīm // ViP_5,18.12 //

GP12visnup_u:9711: antakāle 'pi putrasya drakṣyāmīti mukhaṃ sthitā // ViP_5,20.29 //

GP12visnup_u:9743: soyaṃ yaḥ kāliyaṃ nāgaṃ mamardāruhya vālakaḥ /

GP12visnup_u:9786: pādoddhūtaiḥ pramṛṣṭaiś ca tayoryuddham abhūn mahat // ViP_5,20.67 //

GP12visnup_u:9822: utplutyāruhya taṃ mañcaṃ kaṃsaṃ jagrāha vegataḥ // ViP_5,20.85 //

GP12visnup_u:9856: sa koṣṭhotsaṃgaśayane mānuṣo jāya te katham // ViP_5,20.102 //

GP12visnup_u:10044: yacca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca kiñcidatra carācaram // ViP_5,23.36 //

GP12visnup_u:10050: mayā nātha gṛhītāni tāni tāpāya me 'bhavan // ViP_5,23.39 //
GP12visnup_u:10052: bhāryā bhṛtya jano ye ca śabdādya viṣayāḥ prabho // ViP_5,23.40 //

GP12visnup_u:10084: parābhibhavaniḥ śaṅkaṃ babhūva ca yadoḥ kulam // ViP_5,24.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10087: tato gopāś ca gopyaś ca yathā pūrvam amitrajit /

GP12visnup_u:10099: atha vā kiṃ tadālāpaiḥ kriyantāmaparāḥ kathāḥ /

GP12visnup_u:10101: pitā mātā tathā bhrātā bhartā bandhujanaś ca kim /
GP12visnup_u:10104: karoti kṛṣṇo vaktavyaṃ bhavatā rāma nānṛtam // ViP_5,24.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10112: kathāścakāra reme ca saha tair vrajabhūmiṣu // ViP_5,24.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10115: vane vicaratas tasya saha gopair mahātmanaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10119: abhīṣṭā sarvadā yasya madire tvaṃ mahaujasaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10120: anantasyopabhogāya tasya gaccha mude śubhe // ViP_5,25.3 //
GP12visnup_u:10126: patantīṃ vīkṣya maitreya prayayau paramāṃ mudam // ViP_5,25.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10131: tasya vācaṃ nadī sā tu mattoktāmavamatya vai /
GP12visnup_u:10132: nājagāma tataḥ ktruddho halaṃ jagrāha lāṅgalī // ViP_5,25.9 //
GP12visnup_u:10135: sākṛṣṭā sahasā tena mārgaṃ saṃtyajya nimragā /
GP12visnup_u:10141: so 'haṃ tvāṃ halapātena nayiṣyāmi sahasradhā // ViP_5,25.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10144: bhūbhāge plāvite tasminmumoca yamunāṃ balaḥ // ViP_5,25.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10145: tataḥ snātasya vai kāntir ajāyata mahātmanaḥ // ViP_5,25.15 //
GP12visnup_u:10148: samudrābhe tathā vastre nīle lakṣmīrayacchata // ViP_5,25.16 //
GP12visnup_u:10151: itthaṃ vibhūṣito reme tatra rāmas tathā vraje /
GP12visnup_u:10152: māsadvayena yātaś ca sa punardvārakāṃ purīm // ViP_5,25.18 //
GP12visnup_u:10159: rukmiṇīṃ cakame kṛṣṇaḥsā ca taṃ cāruhīsini /
GP12visnup_u:10160: na dadau yācate caināṃ rukmī dveṣeṇa cakriṇe // ViP_5,26.2 //
GP12visnup_u:10166: prayayau kuṇḍinaṃ draṣṭuṃ vivāhaṃ caidyabhūbhṛtaḥ // ViP_5,26.5 //
GP12visnup_u:10167: śvo bhāvini vivāhe tu tāṃ kanyāṃ hṛtavānhariḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10168: vipakṣabhāram āsajya rāmādiṣv atha bandhuṣu // ViP_5,26.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10173: kuṇḍinaṃ na pravekṣyāmi hyahatvā yudhi keśavam /
GP12visnup_u:10174: kṛtvā pratijñāṃ rukmī ca hantuṃ kṛṣṇamanudrutaḥ // ViP_5,26.9 //
GP12visnup_u:10176: nirjitaḥ pātitaścorvyāṃ līlayaiva sa cakriṇā // ViP_5,26.10 //
GP12visnup_u:10180: jahāra śaṃbaro yaṃ vai yo jaghāna ca śaṃbaram // ViP_5,26.12 //
GP12visnup_u:10183: saṃbareṇahṛto vīraḥ pradyumnaḥ sa kathaṃ mune /
GP12visnup_u:10184: śaṃbaraḥ sa mahāvīryaḥ pradyumnena kathaṃ hataḥ // ViP_5,27.1 //
GP12visnup_u:10185: yastenāpahṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ sa kathaṃ vijaghāna tam /
GP12visnup_u:10192: pātitaṃ tatra caivaiko matsyo jagrāha bālakam /
GP12visnup_u:10193: na mamāra ca tasyāpi jaṭharāgnipradīpitaḥ // ViP_5,27.5 //
GP12visnup_u:10194: matsyabandhaiś ca matsyo 'sau matsyair anyaiḥ saha dvaja /
GP12visnup_u:10196: tasya māyā vatī nāma patnī sarvagṛheśvarī /
GP12visnup_u:10201: ityevaṃ kaunupāviṣṭāṃ nanvīṃ prāhātha nāradaḥ // ViP_5,27.9 //
GP12visnup_u:10207: nāradenaivam uktā sā pālayāmāsa taṃ śiśum /
GP12visnup_u:10210: sābhilāṣā tadā sāpi babhūva gajagāmini // ViP_5,27.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10211: māyāvatī dadau tasmai māyāḥ sarvā mahāmune /
GP12visnup_u:10213: prasājjantīṃ tu tāṃ prāha sa kārṣṇiḥ kamalebhaṇām /
GP12visnup_u:10215: sā tasmai kathayāmāsana putrastvaṃ mameti vai /
GP12visnup_u:10218: sā hi roditite mātā kāntādyāpyativatsalā // ViP_5,27.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10220: ityuktaḥ śaṃbaraṃ yuddhe pradyumnaḥ sa samāhvayat /
GP12visnup_u:10221: krodhākulīkṛtamanā yuyudhe ca mahā balaḥ // ViP_5,27.18 //
GP12visnup_u:10222: hatvā sainyamaśeṣaṃ tu tasya daityasya yādavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10224: tayā jaghāna taṃ daityaṃ māyayā kālaśaṃbaram /
GP12visnup_u:10225: utpattya ca tayā sārdhamājagāma pituḥ puram // ViP_5,27.20 //
GP12visnup_u:10227: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇa saṃkalpā babhūvuḥ kṛṣṇayoṣitaḥ // ViP_5,27.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10229: dhanyāyā khalv ayaṃ putro vartate navayauvane // ViP_5,27.22 //
GP12visnup_u:10230: asminvayasi putro me pradyumno yadi jīvati /
GP12visnup_u:10231: sabhāgyā jananī vatsa sā tvāyā kā vibhīṣitā // ViP_5,27.23 //
GP12visnup_u:10232: atha vā yādṛsaḥ sneho mama yādṛgvapustava /
GP12visnup_u:10236: antaḥpuracarāṃ devīṃ rukmiṇīṃ prāha harṣayan // ViP_5,27.25 //
GP12visnup_u:10237: eṣa te tanayaḥ subhru hatvā śaṃbaramāgataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10239: iyaṃ māyāvatī bhāryā tanayasyāsya te satī /
GP12visnup_u:10240: śaṃbarasya na bhāryeyaṃ śrūyatāmatra kāraṇam // ViP_5,27.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10246: viśaṅkā nātra kartavyā snuṣeyaṃ tava śobhane // ViP_5,27.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10248: nagarī ca samastā sā sādhusādhvityabhāṣata // ViP_5,27.31 //
GP12visnup_u:10249: ciraṃ naṣṭena putreṇa saṃgatāṃ prekṣya rukmiṇīm /
GP12visnup_u:10250: avāpa vismayaṃ sarvo dvāravatyāṃ tadā janaḥ // ViP_5,27.32 //
GP12visnup_u:10253: cārudeṣṇaṃ sudeṣṇaṃ ca cārudehaṃ ca vīryavān /
GP12visnup_u:10254: suṣeṇaṃ cāruguptaṃ ca bhadracāruṃ tathā param // ViP_5,28.1 //
GP12visnup_u:10255: cāruvindaṃ sucāruṃ ca cāruṃ cabalināṃ varam /
GP12visnup_u:10257: anyāś ca bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya babhūvuḥ sapta śobhanāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10258: kālidī mitravindā ca satyā cāgnajitī tathā // ViP_5,28.3 //
GP12visnup_u:10264: svayaṃbare tāṃ jagrāha sā ca taṃ tanayaṃ hareḥ // ViP_5,28.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10268: dauhitrāya dadau rakmī tāṃ spardhannapi cakriṇā // ViP_5,28.8 //
GP12visnup_u:10269: tasyā vivāhe rāmādyā yādavā hariṇā saha /
GP12visnup_u:10270: kalyāṇārthaṃ tataḥsarve ye cānye bhūbhṛtas tathā /
GP12visnup_u:10271: rukmiṇī nagaraṃ jagmurnāmnā bhojakaṭaṃ dvija // ViP_5,28.9 //
GP12visnup_u:10274: anakṣajño halī dyute tathāsya vyasanaṃ mahat /
GP12visnup_u:10278: sabhāyāṃ saha rāmeṇa cakre dyūtaṃ ca vai tadā // ViP_5,28.12 //
GP12visnup_u:10284: dantān vidarśayan mūḍho rukmī cāha madoddhataḥ // ViP_5,28.15 //
GP12visnup_u:10288: rikmiṇaṃ cāpi durvākyaṃ kopaṃ cakre halāyudhaḥ // ViP_5,28.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10290: glahaṃ jagrāha rukmī ca tadarthekṣānapātayat // ViP_5,28.18 //
GP12visnup_u:10292: mayeti rukmī prāhoccair alīkokter alaṃ bala // ViP_5,28.19 //
GP12visnup_u:10294: evaṃ tvayā cedvijitaṃ vijitaṃ na mayā katham // ViP_5,28.20 //
GP12visnup_u:10297: baladevasya taṃ kopaṃ vardhayantī mahātmanaḥ // ViP_5,28.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10298: jitaṃ balena dharmeṇa rukmiṇā bhāṣitaṃ mṛṣā /
GP12visnup_u:10299: anuktvāpi vacaḥ kiñcit kṛta bhavati karmaṇā // ViP_5,28.22 //
GP12visnup_u:10303: babhañja dantānkupito yaiḥ prakāśair jahāsa saḥ // ViP_5,28.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10305: jaghāna tānye tatpakṣe bhūbhṛtaḥ kupito bhṛśam // ViP_5,28.25 //
GP12visnup_u:10306: tato hāhākṛtaṃ sarvaṃ palāyana paraṃ dvija /
GP12visnup_u:10307: tadrājamaṇḍalaṃ bhītaṃ babhūva kupite bale // ViP_5,28.26 //
GP12visnup_u:10316: praviśya dvārakāṃ so 'tha sametya hariṇā tataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10321: pravṛtto yas tathā keśīte sarve nihatāstvayā // ViP_5,29.4 //
GP12visnup_u:10323: nāśaṃ nītāstvayā sarve ye 'nye jagadupadravāḥ // ViP_5,29.5 //
GP12visnup_u:10331: hṛtvā tu so 'suraḥ kanyā rurudhe nijamandire // ViP_5,29.9 //
GP12visnup_u:10335: jahāra so 'suro dityā vāñchatyairāvataṃ gajam // ViP_5,29.11 //
GP12visnup_u:10340: gṛhītvā vāsavaṃ haste samuttasthau varāsanāt // ViP_5,29.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10342: satyabhāmāṃ samāropya yayau prāgjyotiṣaṃ puram // ViP_5,29.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10344: tatau jagāma kṛṣṇaś ca paśyatāṃ dvārakaukasām // ViP_5,29.15 //
GP12visnup_u:10346: ācitā mauravaiḥ pāśaiḥ kṣurāntair bhūr dvijottama // ViP_5,29.16 //
GP12visnup_u:10348: tato muraḥsamuttasthau taṃ jaghāna ca keśavaḥ // ViP_5,29.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10354: kṛṣṇasya yatra govindo yatra govindo jaghne daityānsahasraśaḥ // ViP_5,29.20 //
GP12visnup_u:10355: śastrāstravarṣaṃ muñcantaṃ taṃ bhaumaṃ narakaṃ balī /
GP12visnup_u:10356: kṣiptvā cakraṃ dvidhā cakre cakrī daiteyacakrahā // ViP_5,29.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10362: so 'yaṃ tvayaiva datto me tvayaiba vinipātitaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10363: gṛhāma kuṇḍale ceme pālayāsya ca saṃtatim // ViP_5,29.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10366: tvaṃ kartā ca vikartā ca saṃhartā prabhavo 'pyayaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10369: sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya stūyate tava kiṃ tathā // ViP_5,29.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10370: paramātmā ca bhūtātmā tvamātmā cāpyayo bhavān /
GP12visnup_u:10371: yathātathā stutirnātha kimarthaṃ te pravartate // ViP_5,29.28 //
GP12visnup_u:10381: tāḥ kanyāstāṃs tathā nāgāṃstānaśvān dvārakāṃ purīm /
GP12visnup_u:10386: adityāḥ kuṇḍale dānuṃ jagāma tridaśālayam // ViP_5,29.35 //
GP12visnup_u:10390: sabhāryaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśaṃ līlayaiva vahanyayau // ViP_5,30.1 //
GP12visnup_u:10395: sa tāṃ praṇamya śakreṇa saha te kuṇḍalottame /
GP12visnup_u:10396: dadau narakanāśaṃ ca śaśaṃsāsyai janārdanaḥ // ViP_5,30.4 //
GP12visnup_u:10403: triguṇātīta nirdvadva śuddhasattva hṛdi sthita // ViP_5,30.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10410: devā daityās tathā yakṣā rākṣasāḥ siddhapannagāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10411: kūṣmāṇḍāś ca pisācāś ca gandharvā manujās tathā // ViP_5,30.11 //
GP12visnup_u:10412: paśavaś ca mṛgāścaiva pataṅgāś ca sarīsṛpāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10414: sthūlā madhyās tathā sūkṣmāḥsūkṣmātsūkṣmatarāś ca ye /
GP12visnup_u:10415: dehabhedā bhavān sarve ye kecitpurgalāśrayāḥ // ViP_5,30.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10421: yaiḥ svadharmaparair nātha narair ārādhito bhavān /
GP12visnup_u:10426: yadete puruṣā māyā saiveyaṃ bhagavaṃstava // ViP_5,30.18 //
GP12visnup_u:10428: ārādhito na mokṣāya māyāvilasitaṃ hi tat // ViP_5,30.19 //
GP12visnup_u:10434: nandahastāya te viṣṇo śaṅkhahastāya te namaḥ // ViP_5,30.22 //
GP12visnup_u:10436: na jānāmi paraṃ yatte prasīda parameśvara // ViP_5,30.23 //
GP12visnup_u:10439: mātā devi tvamasmākaṃ prasīda varadā bhava // ViP_5,30.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10444: tataḥ kṛṣṇasya patnī ca śakreṇa sahitāditim /
GP12visnup_u:10445: satyabhāmā praṇamyāha prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ // ViP_5,30.26 //
GP12visnup_u:10447: matpa3sādānna te subhru jarā vairūpyameva vā /
GP12visnup_u:10453: na dadau mānuṣīṃ matvā svayaṃ puṣpair alaṅkṛtā // ViP_5,30.29 //
GP12visnup_u:10461: taṃ dṛṣṭvā prāha govindaṃ satyabhāmā dvijottama /
GP12visnup_u:10462: kasmānna dvārakāmeṣa nīyate kṛṣṇa pādapaḥ // ViP_5,30.33 //
GP12visnup_u:10463: yadi cettvadvacaḥ satyaṃ tvamatyarthaṃ priyeti me /
GP12visnup_u:10465: na me jāṃbavatī tādṛgabhīṣṭā na ca rukmiṇī /
GP12visnup_u:10466: satye yathā tvamityuktaṃ tvayā kṛṣṇāsakṛtpriyam // ViP_5,30.35 //
GP12visnup_u:10475: pārijātaṃ na govinda hartumarhasi pādapam // ViP_5,30.39 //
GP12visnup_u:10477: mahiṣyai sumahābhāga devyai śacyai kurūhalāt // ViP_5,30.40 //
GP12visnup_u:10479: utpādito 'yaṃ na kṣemī gṛhītvainaṃ gamiṣyasi // ViP_5,30.41 //
GP12visnup_u:10481: maiḍhyātprārthayase kṣemī gṛhītvainaṃ hi ko vrajet // ViP_5,30.42 //
GP12visnup_u:10485: vipākakaṭu yatkarma tanna śaṃsaṃti paṇḍitāḥ // ViP_5,30.44 //
GP12visnup_u:10488: kā śacī pārijātasya ko vā śakraḥsurādhipaḥ // ViP_5,30.45 //
GP12visnup_u:10494: tatkathyatāmalaṃ kṣāntyā satvā hārayati drumam // ViP_5,30.48 //
GP12visnup_u:10495: kathyatāṃ ca drutaṃ gatvā paulomyā vacanaṃ mama /
GP12visnup_u:10497: yadi tvaṃ dayitā bharturyadi vaśyaḥ patistava /
GP12visnup_u:10499: jānāmi te patiṃ śakraṃ jānāmi tridaśeśvaram /
GP12visnup_u:10500: pārijātaṃ tathāpyenaṃ mānuṣī hārayāmi te // ViP_5,30.51 //
GP12visnup_u:10503: śrutvā cotsāhayāmāsa śacī cakraṃ surādhipam // ViP_5,30.52 //
GP12visnup_u:10514: ekaikamastraṃ śastraṃ ca daivair muktaṃ sahasraśaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10520: śibikāṃ ca dhaneśasya cakreṇa tilaśo vibhuḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10522: nīto 'gniḥ śītatāṃ bāṇair drāvitā vasavo diśaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10524: sādhyā viśve 'tha maruto gandharvāścaiva sā yakaiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10525: śārṅgiṇā preritair astā vyomni śālmalitūlavat // ViP_5,30.63 //
GP12visnup_u:10527: bhakṣayaṃstāḍayan devān dārayaṃś ca cacāra vai // ViP_5,30.64 //
GP12visnup_u:10529: parasparaṃ vavarṣāte dhārābhir iva toyadau // ViP_5,30.65 //
GP12visnup_u:10531: devaiḥ samastair yuyudhe śakreṇa ca janārdanaḥ // ViP_5,30.66 //
GP12visnup_u:10533: jagrāha vāsavo vajraṃ kṛṣṇaścakraṃ sudarśanam // ViP_5,30.67 //
GP12visnup_u:10537: na mumoca tadā cakraṃ śakraṃ tiṣṭheti cābravīt // ViP_5,30.69 //
GP12visnup_u:10540: trailokyeśa na te yuktaṃ śacībhartuḥ palāyanam /
GP12visnup_u:10544: alaṃ śakra prayāsena na vrīḍāṃ gantumarhasi /
GP12visnup_u:10547: na dadarśa gṛhaṃ yātāmupacāreṇa māṃ śacī // ViP_5,30.74 //
GP12visnup_u:10549: tataḥ kṛtavatī śakra bhavatā saha vigraham // ViP_5,30.75 //
GP12visnup_u:10551: rūpeṇa garvitā sā tu bhartrā kā strī na garvitā // ViP_5,30.76 //
GP12visnup_u:10554: prāha caināmalaṃ caṇḍi sakhyuḥ khe doktivistaraiḥ // ViP_5,30.77 //
GP12visnup_u:10557: jitasya tena me vrīḍā jāyate viśvarūpiṇā // ViP_5,30.78 //
GP12visnup_u:10559: tenodbhavapralayapālanakāraṇena vrīḍā kathaṃ bhavati devi nirākṛtasya // ViP_5,30.79 //
GP12visnup_u:10561: tamajamakṛtamīśaṃ śāśvataṃ svecchayainaṃ jagadupakṛtimartyaṃ ko vijetuṃ samarthaḥ // ViP_5,30.80 //
GP12visnup_u:10568: kṣantavyaṃ bhavataivedam aparādhaṃ kṛtaṃ mama // ViP_5,31.2 //
GP12visnup_u:10571: vajraṃ cedaṃ gṛhāma tvaṃ yadatra prahitaṃ tvayā /
GP12visnup_u:10575: jānīmastvāṃ bhagavato na tu sūkṣmavido vayam // ViP_5,31.5 //
GP12visnup_u:10579: martyaloke tvayā tyakte nāyaṃ saṃsthāsyate bhuvi // ViP_5,31.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10589: yam abhyetya janaḥ sarvo jātiṃ smarati paurvikīm /
GP12visnup_u:10592: dadṛśuḥ pādape tasmin kurvanto makhadarśanam // ViP_5,31.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10594: vibhajya pradadau kṛṣṇo bāndhavānāṃ mahāmatiḥ // ViP_5,31.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10595: kanyāś ca kṛṣṇe jagrāha narakasya parigrahān // ViP_5,31.15 //
GP12visnup_u:10596: tataḥ kāle śubhe prāpte upayeme janārdanaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10605: uvāsa vipra sarvāsāṃ viśvarūpadharo hariḥ // ViP_5,31.20 //
GP12visnup_u:10614: vṛkādyāś ca sutā mādryāṃ gātravatpramukhān sutān /
GP12visnup_u:10615: avāpa lakṣmāṇā putrānkālindyāś ca śrutādayaḥ // ViP_5,32.4 //
GP12visnup_u:10617: aṣṭāyutāni putrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇī śataṃ tathā // ViP_5,32.5 //
GP12visnup_u:10623: chinnaṃ sahasraṃ bāhūnāṃ yatra bāṇasya cākriṇā // ViP_5,32.8 //
GP12visnup_u:10626: kathaṃ kṣayaṃ ca bāṇasya bāhūnāṃ kṛtavānhariḥ // ViP_5,32.9 //
GP12visnup_u:10628: mahatkautūhalaṃ jātaṃ kathāṃ śrotumimāṃ hareḥ // ViP_5,32.10 //
GP12visnup_u:10630: uṣā bāṇasutā vipra pārvatīṃ saha śaṃbhunā /
GP12visnup_u:10634: ityuktā sā tayā cakre kadeti matimātmanaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10635: ko vā bhartā mametyāha punastāmāha pārvatī // ViP_5,32.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10638: kariṣyati sa te bhartā rājaputri bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,32.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10641: tathaivā bhibhavaṃ cakre kaścidrāgaṃ ca tatra sā // ViP_5,32.15 //
GP12visnup_u:10643: kva gatesīti nirlajjā maitreyoktavatī sakhim // ViP_5,32.16 //
GP12visnup_u:10644: bāṇasya mantrī kuṃbhāṇḍaṃ citrarekhā ca tatsutā /
GP12visnup_u:10645: tasyāḥsakhyabhavatsā ca prāha koyaṃ tvayocyate // ViP_5,32.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10646: yadā lajjākulā nāsyai kathayāmāsa sā sakhī /

GP12visnup_u:10651: durvijñeyamidaṃ vaktuṃ prāptuṃ vāpi na sakyate /

GP12visnup_u:10659: manuṣyeṣu dadau dṛṣṭiṃ teṣv apy andhakavṛṣṇiṣu // ViP_5,32.23 //
GP12visnup_u:10667: ayaṃ kṛṣṇasya pautraste bhartā devyā prasāditaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10668: aniruddha iti khyātaḥ prakhyātaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // ViP_5,32.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10670: duṣpraveśā purī pūrvaṃ dvārakā kṛṣṇapālitā // ViP_5,32.28 //
GP12visnup_u:10674: yayau dvāravatīṃ coṣāṃ samāśvāsya tataḥ sakhīm // ViP_5,32.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10680: bhaviṣyati vinā yuddhaṃ bhārāya mama kiṃ bhujaiḥ // ViP_5,33.2 //
GP12visnup_u:10683: piśitāśijanānandaṃ prapsyase tvaṃ tadā raṇam // ViP_5,33.3 //
GP12visnup_u:10686: sabhagnaṃ dhvajamālokya hṛṣṭo harṣaṃ punaryayau // ViP_5,33.4 //
GP12visnup_u:10691: vyādiṣṭaṃ kiṅkarāṇāṃ tu sainyaṃ tena mahātmanā /
GP12visnup_u:10695: māyayā yuyudhe tena sa tadā mantricoditaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10698: yadūnāmācacakṣe taṃ baddhaṃ bāṇena nāradaḥ // ViP_5,33.10 //
GP12visnup_u:10700: yoṣitā pratyayaṃ jagmuryādavā nāmarair iti // ViP_5,33.11 //
GP12visnup_u:10704: yayau bāṇapurābhyāśaṃ nītvā tānsaṃkṣayaṃ hariḥ // ViP_5,33.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10712: taṃ vīkṣya kṣamyatāmasyetyāha devaḥ pitāmahaḥ // ViP_5,33.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10713: tataś ca kṣāntameveti proktvā taṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ jvaram /
GP12visnup_u:10716: mama tvāya samaṃ yuddhaṃ ye smarīṣyanti mānavāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10717: vijvarāste bhaviṣyantī tyuktvā cainaṃ yayau jvaraḥ // ViP_5,33.19 //
GP12visnup_u:10721: yuyudhe śaṅkaraścaiva kārttikeyaś ca śauriṇā // ViP_5,33.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10727: tataḥ praṇemurdaiteyāḥ pramathāś ca samantataḥ // ViP_5,33.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10729: na śaśāka tato yoddhuṃ kṛṣṇenākliṣṭakarmaṇā // ViP_5,33.25 //
GP12visnup_u:10732: jṛṃbhite śaṅkare naṣṭe daityasainye guhe jite /
GP12visnup_u:10733: nīte pramathasainye ca saṃkṣayaṃ śārṅgadhanvanā // ViP_5,33.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10739: balaṃ balena dadṛśe bāṇo bāṇaiś ca cakriṇā // ViP_5,33.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10743: vivyādha keśavaṃ bāṇo bāṇaṃ vivyādha cakradhṛk // ViP_5,33.32 //
GP12visnup_u:10747: prācuryeṇa tato bāṇaṃ hantuṃ cakre harirmanaḥ // ViP_5,33.34 //
GP12visnup_u:10753: mumoca bāṇamuddiśya cchettuṃ bāhuvanaṃ ripoḥ // ViP_5,33.37 //
GP12visnup_u:10766: tattvāya nānṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yanmayā vyāhṛtaṃ vacaḥ // ViP_5,33.43 //
GP12visnup_u:10780: vadanti bhedaṃ paśyanti cāvayorantaraṃ hara // ViP_5,33.49 //
GP12visnup_u:10781: prasanno 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvaṃ gaccha vṛṣabhadhvaja // ViP_5,33.50 //
GP12visnup_u:10792: jigāya śakraṃ śarvaṃ ca sarvāndevāṃś ca līlayā // ViP_5,34.1 //
GP12visnup_u:10794: tatkathyatāṃ mahābhāga paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // ViP_5,34.2 //
GP12visnup_u:10797: narāvatāre kṛṣṇena dagdhā vārāṇasī yathā // ViP_5,34.3 //
GP12visnup_u:10803: tyaktvā cakrādikaṃ cihnaṃ madīyaṃ nāma cātmanaḥ // ViP_5,34.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10805: ātmano jīvitārthāya tato me praṇati vraja // ViP_5,34.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10807: nijacihnamahaṃ cakraṃ samutsṛkṣye tvayīti vai // ViP_5,34.8 //
GP12visnup_u:10808: vācyaś ca paiṇḍrako gatvā tvayā dūta vaco mama /
GP12visnup_u:10814: śaraṇaṃ te samabhyetya kartāsmi nṛpate tathā /
GP12visnup_u:10815: yathā tvatto bhayaṃ bhūyo na me kiñcid bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,34.12 //
GP12visnup_u:10826: vakṣasthale kṛtaṃ cāsya śrīvatsaṃ dadṛśe hariḥ // ViP_5,34.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10828: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāvagaṃbhīraṃ jahāsa garuḍadhvajaḥ // ViP_5,34.18 //
GP12visnup_u:10842: pātito gadayā bhagno dhvajaścāsya garutmatā // ViP_5,34.24 //
GP12visnup_u:10845: tataḥ śārṅgadhanurmuktaiś chittvā tasya śiraḥ śaraiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10846: kāśīpuryāṃ sa cikṣepa kurvaṃllokasya vismayam // ViP_5,34.26 //
GP12visnup_u:10847: hatvā ta pauḍrakaṃ śauri kāśīrājaṃ ca sānugam /
GP12visnup_u:10848: punardvāravatīṃ prāpto reme svargagato yatā // ViP_5,34.27 //
GP12visnup_u:10850: janaḥ kimetadityāha cchinnaṃ keneti vismitaḥ // ViP_5,34.28 //
GP12visnup_u:10851: jñātvā taṃ vāsudevena hataṃ tasya sutastataḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10854: varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti tadā taṃ provāca nṛpātmajam // ViP_5,34.30 //
GP12visnup_u:10861: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kupitā kṛtyā dvāravarīṃ yayau // ViP_5,34.33 //
GP12visnup_u:10863: yayau śaraṇyaṃ jagatāṃ śaraṇaṃ madhusūdanam // ViP_5,34.34 //
GP12visnup_u:10874: tataḥ kāśībalaṃ bhūri pramathānāṃ tathā balam /
GP12visnup_u:10877: kṛtyā garbhamaśeṣāṃ tāṃ tadā vārāṇasīṃpurīm // ViP_5,34.41 //
GP12visnup_u:10879: aśeṣagoṣṭhakośāṃ tāṃ durnirikṣyāṃ surair api // ViP_5,34.42 //
GP12visnup_u:10881: dadāha taddhareścakraṃ sakalāmeva tāṃ purīm // ViP_5,34.43 //
GP12visnup_u:10898: maitreya cakruḥ kṛṣṇaś ca tānnihantuṃ mahodyamam // ViP_5,35.6 //
GP12visnup_u:10900: mokṣyanti te madvacanādyāsyāmyeko hi kauravān // ViP_5,35.7 //
GP12visnup_u:10910: ūcuś ca kupitāḥsarve bāhlikādyāś ca kauravāḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10913: ājñāṃ kurukulotthānāṃ yādavaḥ kaḥ pradāsyati // ViP_5,35.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10915: tadalaṃ pāṇḍuraiś chatrair nṛpayogyair viḍaṃbanaiḥ // ViP_5,35.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10916: tadgaccha bala mā vā tvaṃ sāṃbamanyāyaceṣṭitam /
GP12visnup_u:10919: na nāma sā kṛtā keyamājñā svāmini bhṛtyataḥ // ViP_5,35.16 //
GP12visnup_u:10921: ko doṣo bhavatāṃ nītiryatprītyā nāvalokitā // ViP_5,35.17 //
GP12visnup_u:10922: asmābhir argho bhavato yoyaṃ bala niveditaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:10925: ityuktvā kuravaḥ sāṃbaṃ muñcāmo na hareḥsutam /
GP12visnup_u:10928: utthāya pārṣṇyā vasudhāṃ jaghāna sa halāyudhaḥ // ViP_5,35.20 //
GP12visnup_u:10930: āsphoṭayāmāsa tadā diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan // ViP_5,35.21 //
GP12visnup_u:10938: bibharti yasya bhatyānāṃ so 'pyeṣāṃ na mahīpatiḥ // ViP_5,35.25 //
GP12visnup_u:10940: adya niṣkauravāmurvī kṛtvā yāsyāmi tatpurīm // ViP_5,35.26 //
GP12visnup_u:10945: vīramādāya taṃ sāṃbaṃ sapatnīkaṃ tataḥ purīm /
GP12visnup_u:10947: atha vā kauravāvāsaṃ samastaiḥ kurubhiḥ saha /
GP12visnup_u:10952: āghūrṇitaṃ tatsahasā tato vai hāstinaṃ puram /
GP12visnup_u:10962: kṣāntameva mayetyāha balo balavatāṃ varaḥ // ViP_5,35.36 //
GP12visnup_u:10965: tatastu kauravāḥsāṃbaṃ saṃpūjya bali nā saha /
GP12visnup_u:10978: bibheda sādhumaryādāṃ kṣayaṃ cakre ca dehinām // ViP_5,36.5 //
GP12visnup_u:10990: revatī ca mahābhāgā tathaivānyā varastriyaḥ // ViP_5,36.11 //
GP12visnup_u:10992: reme yadukulaśreṣṭhaḥ kubera iva nandane // ViP_5,36.12 //
GP12visnup_u:10994: musalaṃ ca cakārāsya saṃmukhaṃ ca viḍaṃbanam // ViP_5,36.13 //
GP12visnup_u:10996: pānapūrmāś ca karakāñcikṣepāhatya vai tadā // ViP_5,36.14 //
GP12visnup_u:10999: tataḥ smayitvā sa balo jagrāha musalaṃ ruṣā /
GP12visnup_u:11000: so 'pi śailaśilāṃ bhīmāṃ jagrāha plavagottamaḥ // ViP_5,36.16 //
GP12visnup_u:11001: cikṣepa sa ca tāṃ kṣiptāṃ musalena sahasradhā /
GP12visnup_u:11005: tato balena kopena muṣṭinā mūrdhni tāḍitaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11012: jagannirākṛtaṃ vīra diṣṭyā sa kṣayamāgataḥ // ViP_5,36.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11020: cakre duṣṭakṣitīśānāṃ tathaiva jagataḥ kṛte // ViP_5,37.1 //
GP12visnup_u:11026: sāṃśo viṣṇumayaṃ sthānaṃ praviveśa mune nijam // ViP_5,37.4 //
GP12visnup_u:11034: sāṃbaṃ jāṃbavatīputraṃ bhūṣayitvā striyaṃ yathā // ViP_5,37.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11036: iyaṃ strī putrakāmā vai brūta kiṃ janayiṣyati // ViP_5,37.8 //
GP12visnup_u:11043: ugrasenāya musalaṃ jajñe sāṃbasya codarāt // ViP_5,37.11 //
GP12visnup_u:11045: jajñe taderakāyūrṇaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tair mahodadhau // ViP_5,37.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11047: khaṇḍaṃ cūrṇitaśeṣaṃ tu tato yattomarākṛti // ViP_5,37.13 //
GP12visnup_u:11052: devaiś ca prahito vāyuḥ praṇipattyāha keśavam /
GP12visnup_u:11055: vijñāpayati śakrastvāṃ tadidaṃ śrūyatāṃ vibho // ViP_5,37.17 //
GP12visnup_u:11059: tvayā manāthāstridaśā bhavantu tridive sadā // ViP_5,37.19 //
GP12visnup_u:11061: idānīṃ gamyatāṃ svargo bhavatā yadi rocate // ViP_5,37.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11065: yattvamātthākhilaṃ dūta vedmy etad aham apy uta /
GP12visnup_u:11066: prārabdha eva hi mayā yādavānāṃparikṣayaḥ // ViP_5,37.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11072: prāpta evāsmi mantavyo devendreṇa tathāmaraiḥ // ViP_5,37.25 //
GP12visnup_u:11079: maitreya divyayā gatyā devarājāntikaṃ yayau // ViP_5,37.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11083: mahotpātāñchamāyaiṣāṃ prabhāsaṃ yāma mā ciram // ViP_5,37.30 //
GP12visnup_u:11095: ahaṃ svargaṃ gamiṣyāmi hyupasaṃhṛtya vaikulam // ViP_5,37.35 //
GP12visnup_u:11096: dvārakāṃ ca mayā tyaktāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati /
GP12visnup_u:11109: svaṃsvaṃ vai bhuñjatāṃ teṣāṃ kalahaḥ kiṃnimittakaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11112: mṛṣṭaṃ madīyamannaṃ te na mṛṣṭamiti jalpatām /
GP12visnup_u:11115: jaghnuḥ parasparaṃ te tu śastrair daivabalātkṛtāḥ // ViP_5,37.43 //
GP12visnup_u:11117: erakā tu gṛhītā vai vajrabhūteva lakṣyate /
GP12visnup_u:11122: erakārūpibhir vajrais te nijaghnuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,37.47 //
GP12visnup_u:11124: sahāyaṃ menirerīṇāṃ prāptaṃ jaghnuḥ parasparam // ViP_5,37.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11130: paśyato dārukasyātha prāyādaśvair dhṛto dvija // ViP_5,37.51 //
GP12visnup_u:11131: cakraṃ gadā tathā śārṅga tūṇīśaṅkhosireva ca /
GP12visnup_u:11134: ṛte kṛṣṇaṃ mahātmānaṃ dārukaṃ ca mahāmune // ViP_5,37.53 //
GP12visnup_u:11141: dṛṣṭvā balasya niryāṇaṃ dārukaṃ prāha keśavaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11145: vācyaś ca dvārakāvāsī janaḥ sarvas tathāhukaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11146: yathomāṃ nagarīṃ sarvāṃ samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati // ViP_5,37.59 //
GP12visnup_u:11148: na stheyaṃ dvārakāmadhye niṣkrānte tatra pāṇḍave // ViP_5,37.60 //
GP12visnup_u:11149: tenaiva saha gantavyāṃ yatra yāti sa kauravaḥ // ViP_5,37.61 //
GP12visnup_u:11153: gṛhītvā yādi vajraś ca yadurājo bhaviṣyati // ViP_5,37.63 //
GP12visnup_u:11155: ityukto dārukaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11156: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca bahuśaḥ kṛtvā prāyādyathoditam // ViP_5,37.64 //
GP12visnup_u:11157: sa ca gatvā tadācaṣṭa dvārakāyāṃ tathār'junam /
GP12visnup_u:11158: ānināya mahābuddhirvajraṃ cakre tathā nṛpam // ViP_5,37.65 //
GP12visnup_u:11165: āyayau sa jarānāma tadā tatra sa lubdhakaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11168: tale vivyādha tenaiva tomareṇa dvijottama // ViP_5,37.69 //
GP12visnup_u:11169: tataś ca dadṛśe tatra cadurbāhudharaṃ naram /
GP12visnup_u:11170: praṇipatyāha caivainaṃ prasīdeti punaḥ punaḥ // ViP_5,37.70 //
GP12visnup_u:11172: kṣamyatāṃ mama pāpena dagdhaṃ māṃ trātumarhasi // ViP_5,37.71 //
GP12visnup_u:11175: gaccha tvaṃ matprasādena lubdha svargaṃ surāspadam // ViP_5,37.72 //
GP12visnup_u:11182: tatyāja mānuṣaṃ dehamatītya trividhāṃ gatim // ViP_5,37.75 //
GP12visnup_u:11194: niścakrāma janaṃ sarve gṛhītvā vajrameva ca // ViP_5,38.5 //
GP12visnup_u:11196: vajraṃ janaṃ ca kauteyaḥ pālayañchanakair yayau // ViP_5,38.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11198: svargaṃ jagāma maitreya pārijātaś ca pādapaḥ // ViP_5,38.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11201: plāvayāmāsa tāṃ śūnyāṃ dvārakāṃ ca mahodadhiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11202: vāsudevagṛhaṃ tvekaṃ na plāvayati sāgaraḥ // ViP_5,38.9 //
GP12visnup_u:11208: cakāra vāsaṃ sarvasya janasya munisattamaḥ // ViP_5,38.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11216: karṇādīṃś ca na jānāti balaṃ grāmanivāsinām // ViP_5,38.16 //
GP12visnup_u:11218: sarvānevāvajānāti kiṃ vo bāhubhir unnataiḥ // ViP_5,38.17 //
GP12visnup_u:11222: nivartadhvamadharmajñā yadi na stha mumūrṣavaḥ // ViP_5,38.19 //
GP12visnup_u:11224: strīdhanaṃ caiva maitreya viṣvaksena piragraham // ViP_5,38.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11226: āropayitumārebhe na śaśāka ca vīryavān // ViP_5,38.21 //
GP12visnup_u:11228: na sasmāra tatostrāṇi cintayannapi pāṇḍavaḥ // ViP_5,38.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11230: tvagbhedaṃ de paraṃ cakrurastā gāṇḍīvadhanvinā // ViP_5,38.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11231: vahninā ye 'kṣayā dattāḥ śarāstepi kṣayaṃ yayuḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11234: yanmayā śarasaṃghātaiḥ sakalā bhūbhṛto hatāḥ // ViP_5,38.25 //
GP12visnup_u:11236: ābhīrair apakṛṣyanta kāmaṃ cānyāḥ pradudruvuḥ // ViP_5,38.26 //
GP12visnup_u:11240: jagmurādāya te mlecchāḥ samastā munisattama // ViP_5,38.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11242: aho bhagavatānena muṣṭosmīti ruroda vai // ViP_5,38.29 //
GP12visnup_u:11243: taddhanustāni śastrāṇi sa rathaste ca vājinaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11247: tau bāhū sa ca me muṣṭiḥ sthānaṃ tatsosmi cārjunaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11248: puṇyenaiva vinā tena gataṃ sarvamasāratām // ViP_5,38.32 //
GP12visnup_u:11250: vinā tena yadā bhīrair jitohaṃ rathināṃ varaḥ // ViP_5,38.33 //
GP12visnup_u:11253: cakāra tatra rājānaṃ vajraṃ yādavanandanam // ViP_5,38.34 //
GP12visnup_u:11254: sa dadarśa tato vyāsaṃ phālgunaḥ kānanāśrayam /
GP12visnup_u:11257: uvāca vākyaṃ vicchāyaḥ kathamadya tvamīdṛśaḥ // ViP_5,38.36 //
GP12visnup_u:11263: kiṃ vā kṛpaṇavittāni hṛtāni bhavatār'juna // ViP_5,38.39 //
GP12visnup_u:11267: kena tvaṃ vāsi vicchāyo nyūnair vā yudhi nījātaḥ // ViP_5,38.41 //
GP12visnup_u:11272: yadbalaṃ yacca mattejo yadvīryaṃ yaḥ parākramaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11273: yā śrīśchāyā ca naḥ sosmānparityajya harirgataḥ // ViP_5,38.43 //
GP12visnup_u:11275: hīnā vayaṃ mune tena jātāstṛṇamayā iva // ViP_5,38.44 //
GP12visnup_u:11276: astrāṇāṃ sāyakānāṃ ca gāṇḍīvasya tathā mama /
GP12visnup_u:11283: vibhāti tāta naikohaṃ virahe tasya cakriṇaḥ // ViP_5,38.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11285: vinā tenādya kṛṣṇena gopālaurasmi nirjitaḥ // ViP_5,38.49 //

GP12visnup_u:11350: taṃ dṛṣṭvā gūhamānānāṃ yāsāṃ hāsaḥ sphuṭo 'bhavat /

GP12visnup_u:11358: punaḥsuredralokaṃ vai prāha bhūyo gamiṣyatha // ViP_5,38.83 //
GP12visnup_u:11360: bhartāraṃ prāpya tā yātā dasyuhastaṃ surāṅganāḥ // ViP_5,38.84 //

GP12visnup_u:11372: paraśvo bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdha yathā yāsi tathā kuru // ViP_5,38.90 //

GP12visnup_u:11382: iti śrīviṣṇumahāpurāṇe viṣṇucittyātmaprakāśākhya śrīdharīyavyākhyādvayopete pañca māṃśaḥ samāptaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11383: atha śrīviṣṇumahāpurāṇe viṣṇucittyātmaprakāśākhyaśrīdharīya vyākhyādvayopete ṣaṣṭhāṃśaḥ prārabhyate /
GP12visnup_u:11389: mahāpralayasaṃjñāṃ ca kalpānte ca mahāmune // ViP_6,1.2 //

GP12visnup_u:11400: kriyate copasaṃhārastathāṃ'te ca kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11403: dharmaś catuṣpād bhagavān yasmin viplavam ṛcchati // ViP_6,1.8 //
GP12visnup_u:11409: vivāhā na kalau dharmyā na śiṣyagurusaṃsthitiḥ /

GP12visnup_u:11411: yatra kutra kule jāto balī sarveśvaraḥ kalau /
GP12visnup_u:11412: sarvebhya eva varṇebhyo yogyaḥ kanyāvarodhane // ViP_6,1.12 //
GP12visnup_u:11413: yena kena ca yogena dvijātirdīkṣitaḥ kalau /

GP12visnup_u:11415: sarvameva kalau śāstraṃ yasya yadvajanaṃ dvija /
GP12visnup_u:11416: devatā ca kalau sarvā sarvaḥsarvasya cāśramaḥ // ViP_6,1.14 //

GP12visnup_u:11427: gṛhāntā dravysaṃghātā dravyāntā ca tathā matiḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11433: samānapauruṣaṃ ceto bhuvi vipreṣu vai kalau /
GP12visnup_u:11434: kṣīrapradānasaṃbandhi bhāvi goṣu ca gauravam // ViP_6,1.23 //

GP12visnup_u:11452: gṛhasthāś ca na hoṣyanti na dāsyantyucitānyapi // ViP_6,1.32 //

GP12visnup_u:11458: yaś ca yaścābalaḥ sarvaḥ sa sa bhṛtyaḥ kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.35 //

GP12visnup_u:11482: tadānumeyaṃ prādhānyaṃ kaler maitreya paṇḍitaiḥ // ViP_6,1.47 //
GP12visnup_u:11484: ijyate puruṣair yajñais tadā jñeyaṃ kaler balam // ViP_6,1.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11489: kiṃ devaiḥ kiṃ dvijair vedaiḥ kiṃ śauce nāṃbujanmanā /
GP12visnup_u:11492: phalaṃ tathālpasāraṃ ca vipra prāpte kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.52 //
GP12visnup_u:11494: śūdraprāyās tathā varṇā bhaviṣyanti kalau yuge // ViP_6,1.53 //
GP12visnup_u:11496: bhaviṣyati kalau prāpte hyauśīraṃ cānulepanam // ViP_6,1.54 //

GP12visnup_u:11499: kasya mātā pitā kasya yathā karmānugaḥ pumān /

GP12visnup_u:11508: karotiyaḥ kṛtayuge kriyate tapasā hi saḥ // ViP_6,1.60 //
GP12visnup_u:11512: tacchrūyatāṃ mahābhāgā gadato mama tattvataḥ // ViP_6,2.1 //

GP12visnup_u:11639: ta eva raśmayaḥsapta jāyante sapta bhāskarāḥ // ViP_6,3.20 //

GP12visnup_u:11678: bhuvarlokaṃ tathevordhū plāvayanti hi te dvija // ViP_6,3.39 //

GP12visnup_u:11712: āttagandhā tato bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate // ViP_6,4.14 //
GP12visnup_u:11717: apāmapi guṇo yastu jyotiṣā pīyate tu saḥ /

GP12visnup_u:11721: sa cāgniḥ sarvato vyāpya cādatte tajjalaṃ tathā /

GP12visnup_u:11728: nirā loke tathā loke vāyvavasthe ca tejasi // ViP_6,4.22 //
GP12visnup_u:11730: ūrdhvaṃ cādhaś ca tiryakca dodhavīti diśo daśa // ViP_6,4.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11732: praśāmyati tato vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhatyanāvṛtam // ViP_6,4.24 //
GP12visnup_u:11737: bhītādiṃ grasate cāpi mahānve buddhilakṣaṇaḥ // ViP_6,4.28 //
GP12visnup_u:11738: urvī mahaṃś ca jagataḥ pratintarbāhyatas tathā // ViP_6,4.29 //
GP12visnup_u:11740: pratyāhāre tu tāḥsarvāḥ praviśanti parasparam // ViP_6,4.30 //
GP12visnup_u:11743: udakāvaraṇaṃ yattu jyotiṣā pīyate tu tam /

GP12visnup_u:11745: ākāśaṃ caiva bhūtādirgrasate taṃ tathā mahān /

GP12visnup_u:11756: sa viṣṇuḥsarvamevedaṃ yato nāvartate yatiḥ // ViP_6,4.38 //
GP12visnup_u:11760: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate // ViP_6,4.40 //
GP12visnup_u:11761: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṅkarma vaidikam /
GP12visnup_u:11773: dviparārdhātmakaḥ kālaḥ kathito yo mayā tava /
GP12visnup_u:11775: vyakte ca prakṛtau līne prakṛtyāṃ puruṣe tathā /
GP12visnup_u:11776: tatra sthite niśā cāsya tatpramāṇā mahāmune // ViP_6,4.48 //
GP12visnup_u:11779: ityeṣa tava maitreya kathitaḥ prākṛto layaḥ /

GP12visnup_u:11794: ityevamādibhir bhedais tāpo hyādhyātmikaḥ smṛtaḥ // ViP_6,5.6 //
GP12visnup_u:11796: sarīsṛpādyaiś ca nṛṇāṃ jāyate cādhibhautikaḥ // ViP_6,5.7 //
GP12visnup_u:11800: duḥkhaṃ sahasraśo bhedair bhidyate munisattama // ViP_6,5.9 //
GP12visnup_u:11815: kaṇṭakair iva tunnāṅgaḥ krakacair iva dāritaḥ /
GP12visnup_u:11822: bālabhāve yadā pnoti hyādhibhautādikāni ca // ViP_6,5.20 //
GP12visnup_u:11824: na jānāti kutaḥ kohaṃ kvāhaṃ gantā kimātmanaḥ // ViP_6,5.21 //
GP12visnup_u:11826: kiṃ kāryaṃ kimakāryaṃ vā kiṃ vācyaṃ kiṃ ca nocyate // ViP_6,5.22 //

GP12visnup_u:11828: kiṃ kartavyamakartavyaṃ kiṃ vā kiṅguṇadoṣavat // ViP_6,5.23 //
GP12visnup_u:11854: maraṇe yāni duḥkhāni prāpnoti śṛṇutānyapi // ViP_6,5.36 //
